TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A pouch formed from a piece of small intestine to hold urine after the bladder has been removed.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "depósito de reserva"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Bolsa que se forma con un trozo de intestino delgado para almacenar la orina después de que se extirpa la vejiga.
